item.title: 基于Ubuntu进行STM32程序开发
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: 基于Ubuntu进行STM32程序开发 platform info Ubuntu version : Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS 正点原子 STM32f767 阿波罗开发板 st-link version : v1.6.1-201-g4bfaab0 openocd version : 0.10.0 Cross Compiler : gcc-arm-none-eabi (9.2.1 20191025 release) install stlink driver sudo apt install libusb-1.0-0-dev gcc build-essential cmake libusb-1.0-0 git clone https://github.com/texane/stlink.git cd stlink make
